title: UFC on ESPN+ 19 weigh-in results and live video stream (9 a.m. ET)
text:
TAMPA, Fla. – MMA Junkie is on scene and reporting live from Friday’s early and official UFC on ESPN+ 19 fighter weigh-ins, which kick off at 9 a.m. ET (6 a.m. PT).

The early weigh-ins take place at the UFC host hotel in Tampa, Fla. Unlike most UFC events, there are no ceremonial weigh-ins today for the fans ahead of Saturday’s card, which takes place at Amalie Arena in Tampa, Fla. The card streams on ESPN+.

Among those weighing in are former women’s strawweight champion Joanna Jedrzejczyk (15-3 MMA, 9-3 UFC) and Michelle Waterson (17-6 MMA, 5-2 UFC), who meet in the main event.

The full UFC on ESPN+ 19 weigh-in results include:

MAIN CARD (ESPN+, 8 p.m. ET)

Joanna Jedrzejczyk () vs. Michelle Waterson ()

Kron Gracie () vs. Cub Swanson ()

Niko Price () vs. James Vick ()

Mackenzie Dern () vs. Amanda Ribas ()

Matt Frevola () vs. Luis Pena ()

Eryk Anders () vs. Gerald Meerschaert ()

PRELIMINARY CARD (ESPN+, 5 p.m. ET)
description: Check out the results from the official UFC on ESPN+ 19 fighter weigh-ins.
